amendatorysection.para: (1) It shall be unlawful for a buyer to purchase feeder swine, breeding swine, or both from a seller who has not complied with the Pseudorabies Control and Eradication Act or to import such swine into the state when the seller has not complied with the Pseudorabies Control and Eradication Act or the Animal Importation Act.
(2) It shall be unlawful for a seller to sell or import swine if not in compliance with such acts.
